## QIIME 2

QIIME 2 is a platform for microbial community analysis such as 16S rRNA gene amplicon analysis. The QIIME 2 website comes with a wealth of documentation and tutorials that are worthwhile to check out before running QIIME 2 on your own data:

- [Installation instructions](https://docs.qiime2.org/2023.7/install/native/)
- [The QIIME 2 documentation](https://docs.qiime2.org/2023.7/). 
- [The cancer microbiome tutorial]([cancer-microbiome-intervention-tutorial](https://docs.qiime2.org/jupyterbooks/cancer-microbiome-intervention-tutorial/))
- [q2book](https://gregcaporaso.github.io/q2book/front-matter/preface.html) a very detailed, but still unfinished, tutorial on QIIME 2.

Additionally, we also provide some tutorials:

- [A short QIIME tutorial](https://scienceparkstudygroup.github.io/ibed-bioinformatics-page/source/Qiime/3_evelyn_tutorial_notes.html)
- [Analysing an OTU table with R](https://scienceparkstudygroup.github.io/ibed-bioinformatics-page/source/Qiime/OTU_table_analysis.html)
